welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Morbach, a charming town in Germany known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience our unique culture and hospitality. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Frankfurt-Hahn Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spangdahlem Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Spangdahlem Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bitburg Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Bitburg Air Base Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free, but may experience slower speeds due to the remote location of the airport.
